What are the treatments for dyskeratosis congenita ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of dyskeratosis congenita:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Dyskeratosis Congenita  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dyskeratosis congenita  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dyskeratosis congenita X-linked  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dyskeratosis congenita autosomal dominant  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dyskeratosis congenita autosomal recessive 1  - Seattle Children's Hospital   These resources from
